name: projex
description: A collaborative project management application based on the truSync protocol.
author: Aidan Loughran

scripts.build:libs: npm run build --workspace lib/trusync/packages/lib-js && conc -n sveltekit-validator,trusync-svelte "npm run build --workspace lib/sveltekit-validator" "npm run build --workspace lib/trusync/packages/lib-svelte"
scripts.format: conc -n projex,sveltekit-validator,trusync "prettier --write ." "npm run format --workspace lib/sveltekit-validator" "cd lib/trusync && npm run format"
scripts.lc: echo Projex: $(find src -type f -exec cat {} \; | wc -l) lines
scripts.lint: conc -n projex,sveltekit-validator,trusync " eslint ." "npm run lint --workspace lib/sveltekit-validator" "cd lib/trusync && npm run lint"
scripts.start: npm run build:libs && conc -kn projex-dev,projex-check,sveltekit-validator,trusync-js,trusync-svelte "npm run dev" "npm run watch" "npm start --workspace lib/sveltekit-validator" "npm start --workspace lib/trusync/packages/lib-js" "npm start --workspace lib/trusync/packages/lib-svelte"
scripts.start:db: docker run -d --restart=unless-stopped -p 5432:5432 -v projex-db:/var/lib/postgresql/data -e POSTGRES_USER=projex -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=projex -e POSTGRES_DB=projex postgres:15-alpine
